name: Adera
description: Jane Sinclaire faces her greatest challenge in the mysterious city of Adera. Solve puzzles, collect artifacts, and unlock its secrets!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, 8.1, or 10 Processor: 2 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB GPU with shader model 4.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
